text: Frederick Emil Vollrath (July 16, 1940 - January 1, 2017) was a United States Army lieutenant general who served as Deputy Chief of Staff G-1 Personnel of The United States Army from 1996 to 1998. From 2012 to 2014, he served as Assistant Secretary of Defense for Readiness and Force Management. Vollrath died in 2017.http://www.legacy.com/obituaries/washingtonpost/obituary.aspx?pid=183348058 ==Education== Vollrath received a bachelor's degree in management from the University of Miami in 1962. He later earned a master's degree in personnel management from Central Michigan University. ==References== ==External links== Category:1940 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Miami Beach, Florida Category:Military personnel from Florida Category:University of Miami alumni Category:Central Michigan University alumni Category:United States Army generals
title: Frederick E. Vollrath
